definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: Copper sky, shadows rise, bridge of sighs.
sentences.chinese: 红铜色的天空，阴影出现，叹息桥。

sentences.english: For whether we are white or copper skinned .
sentences.chinese: 不管我们是白，或是红铜色的肤色。

sentences.english: One 120 cable terminating hole with set screw.
sentences.chinese: 研磨红铜叉，镀银上镀铑，120线孔，螺丝锁紧。

sentences.english: It was wrought out of red bronze, and carved with sea-dragons and dragons that have wings.
sentences.chinese: 城门用红铜铸成，雕着海龙和飞龙。

sentences.english: Her coppery hair danced about her head.
sentences.chinese: 她的红铜色头发飞扬着。

sentences.english: Valve Properties Bronze, Brass, Copper and Iron.
sentences.chinese: 阀门特性，青铜，黄统，红铜和铸铁。

definition: brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
copper (pure copper, as opposed to alloy)
to cast (pour metal into a mold)
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
variant of 鎦金|镏金[liu2 jin1]
copper coin of the Ming and Qing Dynasties
